election_record.label: Connecticut 1823 Governor

overview.note: John Bach and John T. Stevens are listed as candidates in the Original Election Returns but did not receive any votes.
David Plant is listed with 40 votes in the summary sheets of the Original Election Returns; it omits his 5 votes in New London County.

sub_unit.name: Newtown
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Newtown.

sub_unit.name: Sherman
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Sherman.

sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in East Haddam.

sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Hampton.

election_record.reference: Original Election Returns. State Archives, Connecticut State Library, Hartford.
